summary: Add support for worker versioning through the UpdateWorkerBuildIdCompatibility gRPC call. This allows workers to manage build ID compatibility sets for seamless deployments and versioning strategies.
userImpact: Users can now manage worker versioning and build ID compatibility for controlled deployments without downtime.
proposedFix: Implement UpdateWorkerBuildIdCompatibility gRPC call with support for operations: AddNewBuildIdInNewDefaultSet, AddNewCompatibleBuildId, PromoteSetByBuildId, PromoteBuildIdWithinSet, and MergeSets.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented - UpdateWorkerBuildIdCompatibility gRPC call added to PHP SDK with full operation support.
keyQuote: Add `UpdateWorkerBuildIdCompatibility` gRPC call to update worker buildID compatibility
